attributes.action: stop computer mice from being extinct within the next 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who doesn't want computer mice to be gone in the next 5 years?
Who thinks it is going to be more hard with using touch screens?

Go ahead and sign this! This is your chance to not let computer mice be extinct!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
